page.title: 04HORSE RIDING
page.content: I go to Paula Chapman's stable 3 times a week,Mondays,Wednesdays,Fridays.On Mondays I have a riding lesson which lasts for 1hour,during which I spend 20mins on walk,trot,canter.Forthe next 5mins we do half scissors and going round the world.I spend the remainder of the lesson jumping. On Wednesday an d friday I help around the jobs like m ucking out,tacking up,walking Beana ar ound the field,grooming,feeding and mixing food.One of the horses I ride is Beana,an Arab Connemare cross chestnut mare with white socks.She stands 15.2 hands and she can clear over 6ft+.To c ompete effectively one has to have bas ic riding gear of a hard hat,jodhpurs, hacking jacket,jodhpur boots and a hai r net.I take part in the local showjum ping conpetitions as often as I can.
